resources.string:
It is a dog eat dog world and there are several dogs at the top of the chain.These dogs are most preferred or let us say most favoured by man kind because of their certain skills or feature. Well let me introduce you to some of the dogs that are at the top of the chain:
 First in the chain is: 
 The Labrador Retriever- this is because of its temperament and versatility this personality traits make it preferable to most Americans 
 The second dog is:
 the Poodle -it is a loveable and feisty bread that is easily portable.
